actions.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 311 (Roll no. 565).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 311 (Roll no. 565).

description: Amendment sought to prohibit $90,000 from being used for the Commercial Kitchen Business Incubator project of the El Pajaro Community Development Corporation in Watsonville, California, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $90,000 from being used for the Commercial Kitchen Business Incubator project of the El Pajaro Community Development Corporation in Watsonville, California, and reduce the amount of section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
